Self.Wiki: Determines havok collision parameters for character.

penetrationRecoverySpeed.Wiki: Speed ​​of getting stuck. Passed to hknpCharacterProxyCinfo::m_penetrationRecoverySpeed. Be careful not to make it too big as it will vibrate or blow off. If it's too small, it may fall off.

keepContactTolerance.Wiki: Clearance distance. Passed to hknpCharacterProxyCinfo::keepContactTolerance. Since it affects the detection range of the manifold, increasing it will reduce tunneling. If it is too large, performance will be affected.

mapuid.Wiki: Parameter override target MapUid. -1 is the default value

hitPartsName.Wiki: Parameter hit name to be overwritten. Part 123456 of h123456_7890. -1 means no specification. Hit directly on top.

refHitPartsName.Wiki: Parameter override target reference hit name. Part 123456 of h123456_7890. -1 means no specification. Match on asset reference hits.

assetPartsName.Wiki: Asset name for parameter overwriting. Part 123456 of AEG123_456_7890. -1 not specified.
